sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi there Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Driver

To remind you of the rental you made today we are sending to you the details of your request:

Your car: Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Car Model

Pick up date: Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Pick-up Date

Pick up Location: Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Pick-up Location

Drop off date: Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Drop-off Date

Drop off Location: Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Drop-off Location

 

You will be notified and recieve the pick-up code when your rental is accepted by our local company worker.

 

Be aware that if there's any incident with the car, we will contact you further to resolve the situation.

 

Thank you for your preference and best regards,

DNB CarSharing

flow.display_value: Send email with car and day details to costumer
